dates.name: Beach Picnic at South Pointe Park
dates.description: Enjoy a relaxing picnic with ocean views at South Pointe Park in Miami Beach.

dates.name: Wynwood Walls Art Walk
dates.description: Explore stunning street art at Wynwood Walls for free.

dates.name: Kayaking at Oleta River State Park
dates.description: Paddle through the mangroves at Oleta River State Park for an affordable adventure.

dates.name: Sunset at Bayside Marketplace
dates.description: Watch the sunset over Biscayne Bay with live music and a vibrant atmosphere.

dates.name: Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden
dates.description: Stroll through a breathtaking collection of tropical plants.

dates.name: Deering Estate Nature Walk
dates.description: Enjoy a peaceful nature walk at the historic Deering Estate.

dates.name: Flamingo Gardens Wildlife Encounter
dates.description: See beautiful flamingos and other wildlife at Flamingo Gardens.

dates.name: Little Havana Cuban Experience
dates.description: Walk through Little Havana, try Cuban coffee, and experience live music.
